content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our Munich apartment, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate, I propose a price of 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial offer, but I believe we can find a more suitable price. I propose 1200 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my aim is to maximize the rental income.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding. Let's continue the negotiation. I propose 1300 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I still prefer a higher price point, I agree to the price of 1350 Euro per month as a compromise. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
